channel.title: Maria Magdalena (Marlene) Üblacker | Global freshwater biodiversity research

item.title: Freshwater habitat regionalization
item.description: A first step towards global freshwater biodiversity assessments is a comprehensive quantification of the variety of habitat types. We aim to characterize the variety and distribution of global freshwater habitats at a high spatial resolution, to perfrom a regionalization analysis, and to provide environmental correlates of spatial biodiversity patterns.
